title: Buoyant force - force on floating cube

content.question: A large container holds a volume <math alttext="V sub W" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>V</mi><mi>w</mi></msub></math> of water that has a density <math alttext="rho sub W" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mi>w</mi></msub></math>. A cube with volume <math alttext="V sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>V</mi><mi>c</mi></msub></math> and density <math alttext="rho sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mi>c</mi></msub></mstyle></math> floats partially submerged in the water. Which of the following expressions is equal to the buoyant force on the cube?

choices.label: <math alttext="rho sub c, end sub, V sub c, end sub, g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mi>c</mi></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mi>c</mi></msub><mi>g</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="rho sub w, end sub, V sub c, end sub, g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mi>w</mi></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mi>c</mi></msub><mi>g</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="rho sub c, end sub, V sub w, end sub, g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mi>c</mi></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mi>w</mi></msub><mi>g</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="rho sub w, end sub, V sub w, end sub, g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mi>w</mi></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mi>w</mi></msub><mi>g</mi></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="rho sub c, end sub, V sub c, end sub, g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mi>c</mi></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mi>c</mi></msub><mi>g</mi></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
